faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Quick answers to common questions about Karavan

whatIsKaravan.question: What is Karavan?
whatIsKaravan.answer: Karavan is a B2B export platform connecting Turkish exporters with buyers across Central Asia and Eastern Europe. We provide end-to-end solutions including secure payments, logistics, and customs support.

howToStart.question: How do I get started?
howToStart.answer: Sign up for early access through our platform. Once approved, you'll receive onboarding support to set up your account and start trading within 24-48 hours.

countries.question: Which countries do you operate in?
countries.answer: We currently operate in Türkiye, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan, Azerbaijan, and Hungary, with plans to expand to more regions.

payments.question: What payment methods do you support?
payments.answer: We support secure payments, bank transfers, and various local payment methods. All transactions are protected until delivery confirmation.

logistics.question: Do you handle customs and logistics?
logistics.answer: Yes! We provide integrated logistics coordination, customs clearance support, and real-time tracking for all shipments through our partner network.

fees.question: What are your fees?
fees.answer: Our fee structure is transparent and competitive. During the early access period, we offer special pricing. Contact us for detailed pricing information.

faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Our team is here to help. Reach out via email or phone during business hours.

cta.heading: Get Early Access
cta.description: Join thousands of exporters already using Karavan to expand their business across Central Asia.

region.title: Wholesale suppliers in
region.subtitle: Local corridors, verified suppliers, and category leaders for

regionsSection.subheading: Focused coverage across Türkiye and Central Asia to streamline cross-border B2B trade.

metrics.heading: Secure B2B Trade Metrics
metrics.subheading: Our platform is already facilitating secure trade between Türkiye and Central Asia with measurable results.

solutions.heading: Solutions
solutions.subheading: We've built a comprehensive ecosystem of solutions to make Türkiye-Central Asia trade seamless and secure.

trustVerification.description: Comprehensive supplier verification with business credentials, certifications, and trade history tracking.

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Secure payment system with automated dispute resolution and multi-currency support.

logisticsCoordination.title: Logistics Coordination
logisticsCoordination.description: End-to-end logistics management with real-time tracking and customs clearance support.

customsCompliance.title: Customs & Compliance
customsCompliance.description: Automated documentation and compliance management for seamless cross-border trade.

insuranceCoverage.title: Insurance Coverage
insuranceCoverage.description: Comprehensive trade insurance covering goods in transit and transaction protection.

tradeFinance.title: Trade Finance
tradeFinance.description: Integrated financing solutions including letters of credit and trade credit facilities.

innovation.heading: Platform Innovation
innovation.subheading: Our platform leverages cutting-edge technology to automate and optimize every aspect of cross-border trade.
aiFeatures: Unified payment processing across multiple currencies
AI-powered risk assessment and fraud detection

trustedPartners.subheading: Backed by trusted global partners across payments, logistics and compliance.

team.subheading: Our diverse team brings together deep expertise in trade, logistics, and technology to build the future of B2B commerce.

tradeFinance.description: Deep expertise in international trade, finance, and cross-border payments with 20+ years combined experience.

logisticsSupply.description: Comprehensive knowledge of logistics, customs, and supply chain management across Central Asia.

technologyInnovation.description: Cutting-edge technology solutions with AI, blockchain, and modern web technologies.

salesModels.heading: Flexible Sales Models
salesModels.subheading: Choose the sales model that works best for your business needs. From direct purchases to competitive auctions, we support all B2B transaction types.

directPurchase.name: Direct Purchase
directPurchase.description: Buyers can directly purchase products from verified suppliers at fixed prices.

rfq.name: Request for Quote (RFQ)
rfq.description: Buyers submit detailed requirements and receive competitive quotes from multiple suppliers.

rfp.name: Request for Proposal (RFP)
rfp.description: Complex procurement process for large-scale projects with detailed proposals.

buyerAuction.name: Buyer Auction
buyerAuction.description: Buyers set maximum prices and suppliers compete to offer the best deals.

sellerAuction.name: Seller Auction
sellerAuction.description: Suppliers auction their products to the highest bidding buyers.

comparison.heading: Sales Model Comparison
comparison.subheading: Speed, control, and complexity at a glance

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Karavan Digital Inc., we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our B2B trade platform.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:
informationWeCollect.personalInfo: Personal information such as name, email address, phone number, and company details
informationWeCollect.businessInfo: Business information including company registration, trade licenses, and financial data
informationWeCollect.usageData: Usage data including website interactions, transaction history, and platform activity
informationWeCollect.cookies: Cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience

howWeUseInfo.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.content: We use your information for the following purposes:
howWeUseInfo.serviceProvision: To provide and maintain our B2B trade platform services
howWeUseInfo.communication: To communicate with you about transactions, updates, and support
howWeUseInfo.improvement: To improve our services and develop new features
howWeUseInfo.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.serviceProviders: With trusted service providers who assist in platform operations
dataSharing.businessPartners: With business partners for transaction facilitation
dataSharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
dataSharing.consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data:
dataSecurity.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest
dataSecurity.access: Restricted access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
dataSecurity.monitoring: Regular security monitoring and incident response
dataSecurity.training: Staff training on data protection best practices

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.access: Right to access your personal data
yourRights.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns
cookies.preferences: Preference cookies to remember your settings

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law. Account data is typically retained for 7 years after account closure, while transaction data may be retained longer for legal and regulatory compliance.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers, including standard contractual clauses and adequacy decisions.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Karavan platform, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.serviceDesc: The Karavan B2B trade platform and related services
definitions.userDesc: Any individual or entity using our platform
definitions.contentDesc: All information, data, text, software, music, sound, photographs, graphics, video, messages, or other materials
definitions.accountDesc: Your registered user account on our platform

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: To use our service, you must:
eligibility.age: Be at least 18 years old or the age of majority in your jurisdiction
eligibility.capacity: Have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements
eligibility.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
eligibility.prohibition: Not be prohibited from using our services under applicable law

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: When creating an account, you agree to:
account.accuracy: Keep your information up to date
account.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials
account.responsibility: Be responsible for all activities under your account

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.content: You may use our service for lawful business purposes only. You agree not to:
useOfService.permitted: Use the platform for legitimate B2B trade activities
useOfService.compliance: Comply with all applicable terms and conditions
useOfService.monitoring: Accept that we may monitor platform usage for security and compliance

payments.title: Payments and Fees
payments.fees: Fees are clearly disclosed before transactions
payments.billing: Payment is due according to agreed terms
payments.refunds: Refund policies are outlined in transaction agreements
payments.disputes: Payment disputes are resolved through our dispute resolution process

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.ownership: We retain ownership of our platform and technology
intellectualProperty.license: You receive a limited license to use our services
intellectualProperty.userContent: You retain rights to content you create and upload
intellectualProperty.infringement: We respect intellectual property rights and expect the same from users

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement:
termination.userTermination: You may close your account at any time
termination.companyTermination: We may suspend or terminate accounts for violations
termination.effect: Termination affects access to platform services

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: Our service is provided 'as is' without warranties:
disclaimers.noWarranty: No warranty of merchantability or fitness for purpose
disclaimers.availability: No guarantee of uninterrupted service availability
disclaimers.thirdParty: No responsibility for third-party content or services

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of our service or violation of these terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Turkey, without regard to conflict of law principles.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration in Istanbul, Turkey, in accordance with the rules of the International Chamber of Commerce.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our service constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us:

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing how you use our site.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.analytics: Understand how visitors use our site

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off:

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how our website is used:

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies are used for advertising purposes:
marketing.targeting: Target ads based on your interests

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We also use cookies from trusted third parties:
thirdPartyCookies.socialMedia: Social media sharing and login features

cookieDuration.title: Cookie Duration
cookieDuration.sessionDesc: Deleted when you close your browser
cookieDuration.persistentDesc: Remain on your device for a set period

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies
browserSettings.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and Site Permissions

optOut.title: Opt-Out Options
optOut.content: You can opt out of specific cookies:

impactOfDisabling.title: Impact of Disabling Cookies
impactOfDisabling.content: Disabling cookies may affect your experience:
impactOfDisabling.functionality: Some features may not work properly
impactOfDisabling.personalization: Personalized content may not be available
impactOfDisabling.analytics: We cannot improve the site based on usage data

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This GDPR compliance statement explains how Karavan Digital Inc. complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) when processing personal data of EU residents.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: Karavan Digital Inc. is the data controller for personal data processed through our platform:
dataController.name: Company Name

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process personal data based on the following legal grounds:
legalBasis.consentDesc: When you explicitly consent to data processing
legalBasis.contractDesc: To fulfill our contractual obligations to you
legalBasis.legitimateDesc: To improve our services and prevent fraud
legalBasis.legalDesc: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

dataCategories.title: Categories of Personal Data
dataCategories.content: We process the following categories of personal data:
dataCategories.identityDesc: Name, email address, phone number, and identification documents
dataCategories.contactDesc: Address, phone numbers, and communication preferences
dataCategories.financialDesc: Payment information, transaction history, and financial records
dataCategories.technicalDesc: IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data
dataCategories.usageDesc: Information about how you use our platform and services

purposes.title: Purposes of Processing
purposes.content: We process personal data for the following purposes:
purposes.serviceProvision: To provide and maintain our B2B trade platform
purposes.accountManagement: To manage your account and provide customer support
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about our services
purposes.marketing: To send you relevant marketing communications (with consent)
purposes.analytics: To analyze and improve our platform performance
purposes.legalCompliance: To comply with legal and regulatory requirements

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain personal data for different periods depending on the purpose:
dataRetention.accountDesc: Retained for 7 years after account closure
dataRetention.transactionsDesc: Retained for 10 years for legal and tax compliance
dataRetention.legalDesc: Retained as required by applicable laws

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We may share personal data with:
dataSharing.serviceProvidersDesc: Trusted third parties who assist in platform operations
dataSharing.legalRequirementsDesc: When required by law or to protect our rights
dataSharing.consentDesc: When you explicitly agree to data sharing

yourRights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
yourRights.content: As an EU resident, you have the following rights:

access.title: Right of Access
access.content: You can request a copy of your personal data we hold

rectification.title: Right of Rectification
rectification.content: You can request correction of inaccurate personal data

erasure.title: Right of Erasure
erasure.content: You can request deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances

portability.title: Right of Data Portability
portability.content: You can request transfer of your data to another service provider

restriction.title: Right of Restriction
restriction.content: You can request limitation of processing in certain circumstances

objection.title: Right of Objection
objection.content: You can object to processing based on legitimate interests

exercisingRights.title: Exercising Your Rights
exercisingRights.verification: We may need to verify your identity
exercisingRights.free: Exercising your rights is free of charge

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest
dataSecurity.incident: Incident response and breach notification procedures

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: When transferring data outside the EU, we ensure:
internationalTransfers.adequacy: Adequacy decisions by the European Commission
internationalTransfers.safeguards: Appropriate safeguards such as standard contractual clauses
internationalTransfers.consent: Your explicit consent for specific transfers

children.title: Children's Data
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 16.

complaints.title: Right to Complain
complaints.content: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority:
complaints.authorityAddress: Bilkent Plaza, B2 Blok, 06530 Ankara, Turkey

changes.title: Changes to This Statement
changes.content: We may update this GDPR compliance statement. We will notify you of significant changes.

hero.title: Partnership Opportunities
hero.subtitle: Join our network of trusted partners
hero.description: Partner with Karavan to expand your business across the Turkic States and Central Asia. We offer comprehensive partnership programs for logistics, financial services, and insurance providers.

partnerships.title: Partnership Types
partnerships.subtitle: Choose the partnership that fits your business

logistics.title: Logistics Partners
logistics.description: Join our logistics network to provide shipping, warehousing, and customs clearance services across the Turkic States.

benefits.1: Access to verified suppliers and buyers

requirements.1: Licensed logistics provider in target markets

financial.title: Financial Partners
financial.description: Provide trade finance, payment processing, and currency exchange services to our B2B platform users.

insurance.title: Insurance Partners
insurance.description: Provide comprehensive insurance coverage for B2B transactions, including cargo, liability, and trade credit insurance.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: See how our partners have grown with Karavan

story1.quote: Partnering with Karavan has transformed our business. We've expanded to 5 new markets and increased our revenue by 300% in just 18 months.
story1.author: Ahmet Yılmaz

story2.quote: The integration with Karavan's platform has given us access to a whole new market. We've onboarded over 500 new clients and processed millions in transactions.
story2.author: Nurbolat Kenzhebayev
story2.position: Managing Director, Central Asia Trade Finance

cta.title: Ready to Partner with Us?
cta.description: Join our network of trusted partners and grow your business across the Turkic States.

form.title: Partnership Application
form.description: Fill out the form below to apply for partnership with Karavan.

placeholders.additionalInfo: Any additional information you'd like to share

success.title: Application Submitted!
